question:
[Martha] had a daughter named [Brandi]. [Carmelita] and her son [George] went out to lunch together yesterday. [Craig]'s aunt, [Maxine], took him to the zoo. [George] 'son, [David], aced his math class and made his father proud. [Peter]'s grandmother, [Carmelita], was eager to spend a weekend with all of her grandchildren. [Martha] loves her son [Peter] very much. He loves her, too. [David] was so happy for his brother, [Craig], getting a promotion.
Question: How is [Maxine] related to [Brandi]?
